description.en:
CRATOS is an ERC-20 utility token designed to facilitate citizen participation in the CRATOS mobile app, a real-time live vote platform. CRATOS has achieved 200K+ downloads, and 40K users on the app, and Users can earn the CRTS tokens based on their activities.

 

Total Supply: 100,000,000,000 CRTS

Circulating Supply: 56,000,000,000 CRTS
